        public MyVertex(AStar astar,
                java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> boxes,
                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pCoords)
        Constructs a MyVertex object which stores the Pukoban board state by copying all the box and player coordinates received.
        Parameters:
        astar - the main class instance
        boxes - the the list of box coordinates
        pCoords - the player coordinates

      • doExpansionPasses

        private Expansion doExpansionPasses(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 box)
        Expands outwards from the current pass expansions and checks for boxes in the path to find the shortest distance to a box from a specific goal. Can specify a box to find the distance to it, instead of finding the closest box to a goal.
        Parameters:
        box - the box to use, can be null if only interested in knowing the closest one
        Returns:
        the distance to the closest box or to the specified box

      • backtrackPath

        private java.util.ArrayList<Expansion> backtrackPath(Expansion initExp)
        Backtracks from a box to a goal by using all the expanded states from the previous round.
        Parameters:
        initExp - the expansion where the box was found
        Returns:
        the path from the box to the goal

      • countTurns

        private int countTurns(java.util.ArrayList<Expansion> path)
        Counts the number of turns needed to go from a specific goal to a specific box.
        Parameters:
        path - the path from a specific goal to a specific box
        Returns:
        the number of turns to get from the goal to the box

      • isAdj

        private boolean isAdj(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 vec1,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 vec2)
        Checks if 2 vectors are adjacent using 4 directions.
        Parameters:
        vec1 - the first vector
        vec2 - the second vector
        Returns:
        whether the vectors are adjacent using 4 directions

      • computeHeuristic

        public void computeHeuristic()
        Computes the heuristic cost for this vertex and stores it. The heuristic is the sum of the shortest distance to a box for each goal.

      • computeHeuristicWithTurns

        public void computeHeuristicWithTurns(int turnValue)
        Computes the heuristic cost for this vertex and stores it. The heuristic is the sum of the shortest distance to a box for each goal considering the number of turns the box has to make to reach the goal. The shortest path over all the box/goal combinations is the one used.
        Parameters:
        turnValue - how much each turn should weigh in the heuristic cost

      • checkGoal

        public boolean checkGoal()
        Returns:
        whether all the boxes coincide with all the goals

      • computeFCost

        public int computeFCost(MyVertex.FCostMethod method)
        Computes f() using the specified method.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to use for calculating f()
        Returns:
        the f() cost
